title: 820-3437 can't activate wifi
message:
Hi, 

Got this macbook with water damage near smc are. IT was turning on but with no wifi and sound. Replaced SMC ( ppus was not stable and there was no light on magsafe , I/O board and flex. Sound is ok now but wifi not working. 


airport is detected but cant activate it. already tested if it can be macos issue but with other OS do same thing.


Any idea?

title: 820-3437 can't activate wifi
message:
Solved. 

SMC_WIFI_PWR_EN signal was not stable. Sometimes it activated sometimes not. Reflow SMC and now is ok.
